entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
